page.title: 09THE RECTOR OF BUCKHURST HILL
page.content: The Rector is a well known figure of the area he has lived here for 6 years. Before this he had a variety of jobs both here and abroad.He sees his job as guiding people to God and to help spread his word.Cannon Hunter enjoys hi job but feels that the days are just to short.At 8.15 a.m. he holds Matins where each day they pray for a different road in the area.In the afternoon he goes on his visits.Tuesday is his day of and he likes to spend an hour each evening with his children. St.Johns Church was originally built in 1830 so that the people did not have to walk across the River Roding Valley to Chigwell. The first church was very small.Cannon Hunter beleives that it is mainly middle class people that come to church.The congregation has increased from about 70 to 300.
